name: Trace Fighter
description:
(Back)Trace Fighter is a fighting game made in one weekend for the Backtrace Game Jam.

You have to receive ancient knowledge, which is shared across generations in order to beat the final boss!

One piece of knowledge I will share is that your left mouse button will be important for your teachings.

Ancient history does show that restart buttons might not always operate properly.

Made by 2 people:

Dylan Smit - Developer

Lotte de Jonge - Artist

Credits to:

Dark Fantasy Gigantic Environment - Unity Asset

Colossal Game Music Collection - Unity Asset
